thread.title: UK police investigating another suspicious package at parliament

title: UK police investigating another suspicious package at parliament
text: March 15, 2018 / 11:31 AM / Updated 3 minutes ago UK police investigating another suspicious package at parliament Reuters Staff 1 Min Read LONDON (Reuters) - London police said they were investigating a suspicious package at the British parliament where one woman was being assessed as a precaution. “We were called ... to a suspicious package delivered to an office at the Palace of Westminster,” a Metropolitan police spokeswoman said. “Specialist officers are on scene and the package is being assessed.... A woman is being assessed as a precaution.” Several suspicious parcels have been posted to Muslim lawmakers’ parliamentary offices in recent days. They were later found to be non-hazardous. Reporting by Costas Pitas; editing by Stephen Addison
